nodes.text: Jedi on the Roof was a musical playing at the Galaxies Opera House in 19 BBY. A sign advertising the show was displayed outside of the opera house during a performance of Squid Lake attended by Palpatine and Anakin Skywalker. The sign depicted a silhouette of the Jedi Master Yoda holding his lightsaber.
This title has a real-world parallel to the musical Fiddler on the Roof.
